markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="">[Saboteur](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3608)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Saboteurs excel at infiltration, using it to perform destructive acts.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Saboteur](/NPCs.aspx?ID=3608)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Human" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=627" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=628" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [NPC Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=236) pg. 153

**Perception** +8; (10 to find traps) 

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=34) +7, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=36) +5, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=37) +6, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=38) +7, [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=39) +5, [Engineering Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +8, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=40) +5, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=47) +6, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=48) +9, [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=49) +6, [Thievery](/Skills.aspx?ID=50) +9, [Underworld Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=41) +6

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +1

**Dex** +3

**Con** +1

**Int** +2

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +1
</row>

**Snare Crafting** The saboteur can [Craft](/Actions.aspx?ID=2385) snares and has the supplies to make up to two [caltrop snares](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3367) and up to two [hampering snares](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3374). Snare rules can be found [here](/Rules.aspx?ID=3315).

**Items**
[Artisan's Toolkit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2703) (snare toolkit), [Crowbar](/Equipment.aspx?ID=18), [Disguise Kit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=19), [Hand Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=69) (10 bolts), [Sap](/Weapons.aspx?ID=37), [Thieves' Toolkit](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2758)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 17 (19 vs. traps)

**Fort** +5 

**Ref** +9 (+11 vs. traps)

**Will** +8 

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**HP** 28

</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
sap +7 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188)),
**Damage** 1d6+3 bludgeoning

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +9 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4+3 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hand crossbow +9 ([range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d6+2 piercing

**Sneak Attack**   The saboteur deals an extra 1d6 precision damage to [off-guard](/Conditions.aspx?ID=58) creatures.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-550" />
name: Saboteur

Snare rules can be found here. Items Artisan's Toolkit (snare toolkit), Crowbar, Disguise Kit, Hand Crossbow (10 bolts), Sap, Thieves' Toolkit --- AC 17 (19 vs. traps) Fort +5 Ref +9 (+11 vs. traps) Will +8 HP 28 --- Speed 25 feet Melee Single Action sap +7 (Agile, Nonlethal), Damage 1d6+3 bludgeoning Melee Single Action fist +9 (Agile, Finesse, Nonlethal, Unarmed), Damage 1d4+3 bludgeoning Ranged Single Action hand crossbow +9 (range increment 60 feet, reload 1), Damage 1d6+2 piercing Sneak Attack The saboteur deals an extra 1d6 precision damage to off-guard creatures.
